tool_description: Extract thumbnail image from mp4 video at a specific time
name: Video Thumbnail Extractor
title: Video Thumbnail Extractor

api_list.name: Video Thumbnail Extractor
api_list.description: Extractor thumbnail image from mp4 video

required_parameters.name: videoUrl
required_parameters.description: The full URL link of the mp4 video

optional_parameters.name: percentage
optional_parameters.description: The specific time between 0% - 99% of video duration where the thumbnail image will be extracted. Default value is 50%.

api_list.name: Video Thumbnail Extractor_copy
api_list.description: Extractor thumbnail image from mp4 video

required_parameters.name: videoUrl
required_parameters.description: The full URL link of the mp4 video

optional_parameters.name: percentage
optional_parameters.description: The specific time between 0% - 99% of video duration where the thumbnail image will be extracted. Default value is 50%.
